mapper.select: select camp.camp_no as campNo, camp_name as campName, camp_addr as campAddr, camp_site as campSite, camp_tel as campTel, camp_theme as campTheme, camp_fac as campFac, camp_ctg as campCtg, campenv.env_name as campEnv, (select min(room_price) from camproom where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as campMinPrice, (select avg(rev_star) from review where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as campStar from camp full join campenv on (camp.camp_no = campenv.camp_no)

select camp_no as campNo, ceo_id as ceoId, camp_addr as campAddr, camp_name as campName, camp_site as campSite, camp_tel as campTel, camp_theme as campTheme, camp_fac as campFac, camp_ctg as campCtg from camp where camp_no = #{campNo}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from ( select camp.camp_no as campNo, camp_name as campName, camp_addr as campAddr, camp_site as campSite, camp_tel as campTel, camp_theme as campTheme, camp_fac as campFac, camp_ctg as campCtg, campenv.env_name as campEnv, (select min(room_price) from camproom where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as campMinPrice, (select avg(rev_star) from review where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as campStar from camp full where
camp_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
camp_addr like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
join campenv on (camp.camp_no = campenv.camp_no) )c) where rnum between ${start} and ${end}
